name: Endace
description: App integrates with the Endace Packet Capture device to implement investigative actions

max_pcap_size.description: Maximum pcap size in bytes (0 = no max)

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration
Download a PCAP into the vault
Get the status of a previously executed query
actions.verbose: Request the status of a query and when complete it will include a link for downloading the PCAP

actions.description: Run a query to create a PCAP

time.description: The time of interest, in RFC-3339 format

start_time.description: The start time of the data, in RFC-3339 format

end_time.description: The end time of the data, in RFC-3339 format

span_before.description: The span, in seconds, before the value specified by the 'time' parameter

span_after.description: The span, in seconds, after the value specified by the 'time' parameter

host1.description: The flow initiator, expressed as <IP Address>[/<CIDR prefix>]

host2.description: The flow target, expressed as <IP Address>[/<CIDR prefix>]. Use 0.0.0.0/0 for directionless IP of host2

protocol.description: The name of the IP protocol; for example, 'udp', 'tcp'
